thumb.description: 下記リンクにて、この動画内のBGMを販売しています！The background music in this video is for sale at the link below!👉https://bgms.booth.pm/items/6831175----🎧Youtube music👉https://music.youtube.com/channel/UCPoaL0yorfNYTxS9xLzZ5rQ 🎧Spotify👉https://open.spotify.com/intl-ja/artist/6VLPxVwd1q9orMwrazrYll 🎧Apple Music👉https://music.apple.com/jp/artist/1804546728 🎧Amazon Music👉https://music.amazon.co.jp/artists/B0F2HZSZT6/honorable-japanese-song ----#8bit, #chiptune, #8-bitmusic, #videogamemusic, #bossbattletheme, #RPGbattlemusic, #gamesoundtrack, #retrogamemusic, #pixelartmusic, #NESstyle, #SNESmusic, 16-bit music, battle theme compilation, boss fight music, gaming background music, retro gaming, pixel games, chiptune compilation, 8-bit compilation, game composer, RPG soundtrack, video game OST, gaming music, battle themes, chip music, game audio, retro sound, game BGM, battle BGM, chipmusic, video game composer, boss themes, game battle music, fantasy RPG music,
